nodes.text: A mining hangar in the planet Sullust's capital city Pinyumb was used as the hideout of the Sullustan resistance, a Rebel Alliance cell based in the city. After rescuing First Sergeant Hazram Namir of the Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry, the Sullustan resistance fighter Nien Nunb brought the rebel soldier back to the mining hangar to meet with the other resistance members.
The mining hangar appeared in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
